mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EXHIBITION_INFO WHERE EXHIBITION_START_DATE = TO_DATE('2022.04.28') AND EXHIBITION_END_DATE = TO_DATE('2022.05.31')

SELECT *
FROM ( SELECT * FROM EXHIBITION_INFO WHERE EXHIBITION_START_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY EXHIBITION_START_DATE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8 ORDER BY EXHIBITION_START_DATE
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM EXHIBITION_INFO WHERE EXHIBITION_START_DATE < TO_DATE('${st}') AND EXHIBITION_END_DATE > TO_DATE('${ed}') ORDER BY EXHIBITION_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM <= ${endRow}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM EXHIBITION_INFO WHERE EXHIBITION_TITLE LIKE '%${title}%' ORDER BY EXHIBITION_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM <= ${endRow}
select * from (select * from EXHIBITION_INFO order by dbms_random.value) where rownum <= 3
SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM EXHIBITION_INFO WHERE TO_DATE(EXHIBITION_END_DATE) >= SYSDATE ORDER BY EXHIBITION_END_DATE) WHERE ROWNUM=1
